column4: which version of ubuntu 8.04 should i install the 32 or 64 bits ?
if you are inexperienced or have a 32-bit-processor, install 32 bit, if you have a 64-bit-processor and are experienced, install 64 bit
it's harder to install some things like Java, Opera or Flash
if you do a lot of video editing or such things then 64 bit is beneficial
